name: Dangerous Denizens, vol. 1.
description:
The first volume of danger denizens contains three monsters for use in the Second edition of the Torchbearer RPG and part of the 2021 Torchbearer Monster Mash.  Unleash the Gooze, Redcap Sphinx, and R.O.S.S. on your world!!

2021 Torchbearer Monster Mash: https://itch.io/jam/torchbearer-monster-mash
